name: NS Custom Css
author: NsThemes

sections.description:
This plugin allow you to add your custom css code without edit your theme.
Page option will appear in your WordPress backend menu, and here you can add your css.
You only have to digit your class or id and save it!
The snippet code will added in your header, in a very clean and simple mode.
You can insert different style for desktop, tablet and mobile device(NEW FEATURES!).

PREMIUM FEATURES of custom css:

You can add different custom css code for any page.
You can also add different custom css code in article, archive and category pages

For more information about PREMIUM VERSION, visit official page NsThemes Marketplace.

We test our plugins with many other. If you find incompatibility with one specific plugin, please inform us at report@nsthemes.com.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘ns-custom-css’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. View admin menu, then click on ‘Custom Css’ and digit your code in the textarea
sections.faq:
Code is required to use this plugin?

No code require to use this plugin.

Can I change code in the future?

Yes, you can change this code always you want.

This code will add to all my page in the website?

Yes, the code will added in all pages.
